description: Rules for extracting Pack Count (number of packages/bottles in the product)
instructions: Extract the pack count if explicitly mentioned. Look for keywords like 'pack', 'bottles', 'pack of', 'case of'. If NOT mentioned, default to 1 (single unit).
default_reasoning: No pack keywords found, default to 1

examples.title: Multivitamin 60 Tablets
examples.reasoning: No pack keyword found - default to 1 (single unit)

warnings: Do NOT confuse size (capsules/tablets quantity) with pack count (bottles/packages)
Example: '2 Pack Fish Oil 180 Capsules' â†’ Pack Count = 2, Size = 180
If no pack keywords found, default to 1
